summary: This is an internal email from October 2020 regarding the Epstein search warrant database. The sender flags an email address for further privilege review because it may belong to Jack Goldberger, who represented Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Korologos, M
persons.context: Recipient of an internal email regarding the Epstein search warrant database and a flagged email address for privilege review.

persons.name: Jack Goldberger
persons.context: Identified as an attorney who represented Jeffrey Epstein; his potential email address is flagged for privilege review in the Epstein search warrant database.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the search warrant database; the flagged email address belongs to his attorney, Jack Goldberger.

connections.description: Goldberger is identified as an attorney who represented Epstein.

events.title: Email Regarding Epstein Search Warrant Database
events.description: An internal email is sent flagging a potential email address belonging to Jack Goldberger for further privilege review in the Epstein search warrant database.

keyFacts: An internal email from October 2020 discusses the Epstein search warrant database.
A specific email address is flagged for further privilege review because it may belong to Jack Goldberger, Epstein's attorney.
The communication indicates ongoing post-conviction investigative and review processes related to Epstein's case.
